name: Arco Doppio
hero_image_alt: Arco Doppio dual-boiler espresso machine in brushed steel finish on a dark walnut countertop, steam rising from a freshly pulled espresso, PID display glowing softly, a small latte art pitcher beside it, diffused natural light from a nearby window
headline: Two boilers. Zero compromises.
subheadline: A dual-boiler machine with PID temperature control that lets you brew and steam simultaneously — the natural next step for the serious home barista.
description_short: A dual-boiler espresso machine with PID control that lets you brew and steam at the same time.
description_long: The Arco Doppio removes the biggest limitation of single-boiler machines: waiting. With independent boilers for brewing and steaming, you can pull a shot and texture milk simultaneously — a workflow that changes how your mornings feel. PID temperature control on both boilers keeps extraction stable within ±1°C, so your espresso tastes the same on the hundredth shot as the first. The 58mm commercial portafilter, quick-set steam wand, and clean digital interface make the Doppio a machine you'll use for years without outgrowing.

key_specs.pressure: Rotary vane pump, adjustable OPV (6–10 bar)

use_case_headline: Perfect for the home barista who's ready to level up.
use_case_body: If you've been pulling shots on a single-boiler and want real temperature stability and simultaneous steaming, the Doppio is the logical upgrade. It closes the gap between home machines and commercial equipment without demanding a commercial budget.

pairing_products.rationale: Stepless grind adjustment pairs perfectly with the Doppio's PID precision for dialling in any bean.
A WDT tool and precision scale will help you get the most from the dual-boiler workflow.
